betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§bConstellation              §bEffect
§6Aevitas                         §fNearby living entities receive Regeneration,Plants experience accelerated growth
§b---------------------------------------------------------------------------
§6Armara                         §fHostile mobs and projectiles are repelled away from the Pedestal
§b---------------------------------------------------------------------------
§6Discidia                        §fHostile mobs near the Pedestal take damage over time
§b---------------------------------------------------------------------------
§6Evorsio                          §fBreaks solid blocks near the Pedestal
§b---------------------------------------------------------------------------
§6Vicio                               §fEntities near the Pedestal receive creative flight
§b---------------------------------------------------------------------------
§6Bootes                          §fNearby animals "shed" their drops as if they were slain
§b---------------------------------------------------------------------------
§6Fornax                           §fNearby blocks become their burnt or smelted counterparts
§b---------------------------------------------------------------------------
§6Horologium                 §fMachines experience bonus ticks and work faster
§b---------------------------------------------------------------------------
§6Lucerna                        §fHostile mobs do not spawn around the Pedestal
§b---------------------------------------------------------------------------
§6Mineralis                      §fNearby Stone has a chance of becoming ore blocks
§b---------------------------------------------------------------------------
§6Octans                             §fNearby Water blocks become easier to fish
§b---------------------------------------------------------------------------
§6Pelotrio                       §fEntities experience a higher chance of spawning, including hostile mobs
§b---------------------------------------------------------------------------
